name: Add a new row in Google Sheets for every completed Pipefy card
description: Streamline your project management process by automatically logging completed tasks in Pipefy to Google Sheets. With this template, every time a card is marked as done in Pipefy, Make will create a new row in your Google Sheets, allowing you to easily track and analyze your project progress. This integration ensures that you maintain an organized record of your achievements, enhancing your team's productivity and accountability.
